node.detail_zh: 患者為第 85 宗患者的家庭傭工，亦是第 90 宗患者（另一名家傭）的密切接觸者。患者過往健康良好，居於大坑大坑道113 號瑞士花園四座。她沒有出現病徵，早前因被列作密切接觸者被安排入住檢疫中心。其呼吸道樣本於 3 月 8 日證實對病毒呈陽性反應，現時在威爾斯親王醫院接受治療。患者於潛伏期內沒有外遊，其密切接觸者（除早前確診的兩名患者外）包括僱主丈夫及僱主兒子沒有出現病徵，正接受檢疫。
node.detail_en: The patient is a domestic helper of patient no. 85 and is a close contact of patient no. 90 (another helper). The patient has good past health and lives at Block 4, Swiss Towers at 113 Tai Hang Road, Tai Hang. She has all along been asymptomatic and was earlier sent to the quarantine centre as a close contact. Her respiratory specimen was tested positive on Mar 8. She is under treatment at Prince of Wales Hospital. The patient had no travel history during the incubation period. Her close contacts (except the two confirmed patients), namely her employer’s husband and son are asymptomatic and are quarantined.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 馬主家族首名確診患者為馬主周巧兒，及後其兄嫂及兩名家傭先後確診，其松鼠狗曾驗出對病毒呈弱陽性反應。
groups.description_en: A female horse owner was the first confirmed case of the family, having spread to her elder brother and sister-in-law, and her 2 domestic helpers. Her dog was also tested "weak positive" to the coronavirus.

node.location_zh: 大坑道 113 號瑞士花園四座
node.location_en: Block 4, Swiss Towers, 113 Tai Hang Road
node.remarks_zh: 患者與第 90 宗患者同為第 85 宗患者的家庭傭工
node.remarks_en: The patient and patient no. 90 are the domestic helpers of patient no. 85
